paper.title: Agents with power
paper.abstract: It should be noted there are also some potentialthreats for the utilities to lose customers or lose mar-ket opportunities due to inability to upgrade orchange their products or to change their market viewfrom a monopoly to a highly competitive market.Here, we describe project ISES (Information,Society, Energy, and Systems) in Swedenwhere these types of issues are addressed.The main business process of the energy sec-tor has typically been around productionand distribution of kiloWatt hours (kWh).However, the power grid can also be used as adata communication channel with increasinglyhigher bandwidth—over 1 Mb/s on parts of the grid—which creates new business opportunities. Another keytechnological driving force is the rapid development oftechnologies supporting design and implementation ofsmart distributed equipment communicating on theelectric grid.
